path: /Users/arpithaprakash/Capstone/1-2CR CONOPS&DRAWs - Copy/New folder (45) - Copy/Team LFX CONOP (1).pptx

sections.MISSION: Bull Troop conducts Team Live Fire Exercises (LFX) at GTA (Range 208) from 25-26 July 2023 IOT certify lethal teams and train in preparation for Saber Junction 2023
sections.PURPOSE: of this live fire is to certify teams and build up to Troop STX in preparation for Saber Junction 2023.
sections.KEY TASKS:
– Validate dismounted teams under blank and live fire (day/night) conditions
Challenge Team Leader’s to control their soldiers as they shoot, move, and communicate.
sections.END STATE:
All Bull Troop Infantry Teams are certified for fire and maneuver operations in a tactical environment.
Training Objectives:
Team Leader controls FOOM
React to contact as a team Establish SBF
Control rates of fire
Send a SPOTREP
Conduct Field Maintenance
OIC: 2LT Jeffries
Ryan.d.jeffries.mil@army.mil
sections.COORDINATING INSTRUCTIONS:
CLI: CLI: Training Population will bring Food/Water
CLIII: Training population will top off before SP from Rose Barracks
CLIV: Pallets, Tarps, 5 strand C-Wire Needed
CLV: pending
Misc: 2x Fire extinguishers needed (coordinating with DISTRO)
RSO: SFC Restrepo
